snippet: Mostafa Kamel Mostafa is on trial in New York on charges of helping to orchestrate a kidnapping, planning a terrorist training camp in Oregon and helping Al Qaeda in Afghanistan.
abstract: Federal prosecutor Edward Y Kim says Egyptian-born cleric Mostafa Kamel Mostafa was a trainer of terrorists; Mostafa faces terrorism charges in New York for his role in 1998 hostage-taking of group of tourists in Yemen, and his is the second major terrorism trial in Manhattan in two months.
lead_paragraph: Mostafa Kamel Mostafa is on trial in New York on charges of helping to orchestrate a kidnapping, planning a terrorist training camp in Oregon and helping Al Qaeda in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Muslim Cleric ‘Was Committed to War,’ Prosecutor Says in Terrorism Trial
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Says a Cleric ‘Was Committed to War’
